head.title: Gretchen Dingman Is Wed To Thomas Lee in Seattle

hedline.hl1: Gretchen Dingman Is Wed To Thomas Lee in Seattle

block.p: LEAD: Gretchen Van Cleef Dingman, a daughter of Dr. and Mrs. Peter Van Cleef Dingman of Middlebury, Conn., was married yesterday in Seattle to Thomas Lee, a son of Mr. and Mrs. Henry Lee of Boston. The Rev. Laurie Marree Fowler, a minister of the Church of Religious Science, officiated at the Robinswood House in Robinswood

LEAD: Gretchen Van Cleef Dingman, a daughter of Dr. and Mrs. Peter Van Cleef Dingman of Middlebury, Conn., was married yesterday in Seattle to Thomas Lee, a son of Mr. and Mrs. Henry Lee of Boston. The Rev. Laurie Marree Fowler, a minister of the Church of Religious Science, officiated at the Robinswood House in Robinswood

Gretchen Van Cleef Dingman, a daughter of Dr. and Mrs. Peter Van Cleef Dingman of Middlebury, Conn., was married yesterday in Seattle to Thomas Lee, a son of Mr. and Mrs. Henry Lee of Boston. The Rev. Laurie Marree Fowler, a minister of the Church of Religious Science, officiated at the Robinswood House in Robinswood Park.

Mrs. Lee, a physical therapist at the West Seattle Physical Therapy Clinic, graduated from the Ethel Walker School and received degrees in social work and physical therapy from the University of Wisconsin. The bridegroom, a furniture maker in Seattle, graduated from the Brooks School and Washington University and studied at the North Bennett Street School of Furniture in Boston.
